name: SELECT apartmentID
func:
let floor = msg.payload.floor
let apartment = msg.payload.apartment
let token = msg.payload.token
let name = msg.payload.name
let surname = msg.payload.surname



msg.payload = {
    floor : floor,
    apartment: apartment,
    token: token,
    name: name,
    surname: surname
}

msg.topic = "SELECT apartmentID from apartment "+
            "WHERE floor = " + floor + 
            " and apartment_number = " + apartment + ";"
            
return msg;

name: INSERT/SELECT
func:
let floor = msg.payload[0].floor
let apartment = msg.payload[0].apartment
let latitude = 0.0
let longitude = 0.0
let building_quality = 0.0
let name = msg.payload[0].name
let surname = msg.payload[0].surname
let token = msg.payload[0].token

msg.topic = "INSERT INTO apartment(apartmentID, floor, apartment_number, latitude, longitude, building_quality) "+
            "VALUES (null, " + floor + ", " + apartment + ", " + latitude + ", " + longitude + ", " + building_quality + ");\n"+
            "SELECT apartmentID from apartment "+
            "WHERE floor = " + floor + 
            " and apartment_number = " + apartment + ";"
            

return msg;

name: INSERT user
func:
let apartmentID = msg.payload[1].apartmentID
let token = msg.payload[0].token
let name = msg.payload[0].name
let surname = msg.payload[0].surname


msg.payload = {
    token : token,
    apartmentID : apartmentID,
    name : name,
    surname : surname
}

msg.topic = "INSERT INTO user(token, apartmentID, name, surname) "+
            "VALUES ('" + token + "', " + apartmentID + ", '" +
            name + "', '" + surname +"');" 
return msg

name: INSERT user
func:
let apartmentID = msg.payload[1].apartmentID
let token = msg.payload[0].token
let name = msg.payload[0].name
let surname = msg.payload[0].surname

msg.topic = "INSERT INTO user(token, apartmentID, name, surname) "+
            "VALUES ('" + token + "', " + apartmentID + ", '" +
            name + "', '" + surname + "');" 
return msg

name: Check user
SELECT
func:
let token = msg.payload.content

msg.topic = "SELECT * from user "+
            "WHERE token = '" + token + "';"
            
return msg;

name: Get apartments with active conditioners
Spread the word
Get user apartments with active conditioners
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM smartAirConditioner AS sac "+
            "JOIN apartment AS ap " +
            "ON sac.apartmentID = ap.apartmentID "+
            "JOIN user AS u " +
            "ON sac.apartmentID = u.apartmentID "+
            "WHERE sac.active = 1 "+
            "AND u.chatId ='"+msg.payload.uid+"'";
return msg;

name: Update request
info: This flow is a clock for the automatic update of the database. Every ten minutes, a message is sent to each active conditioner, so that they can start their update.

name: Select floor/apartmentNr
func:
let chatId = msg.payload.chatId

msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM apartment "+
            "WHERE apartmentID IN "+
                "(SELECT apartmentID FROM user " +
                "WHERE chatId = '" + chatId + "');"
return msg;
